decision_conditions: Due to insufficient information submitted for Condition 5 (Sustainable Drainage) of planning permission 20/01105/FUL the proposal fails to meet the drainage hierarchy, to provide an adequate maintenance and management strategy, to provide network calculations in support of the given runoff rates and the proposed attenuation volume calculations for the proposed sustainable drainage system. The applicant has not justifiably discounted green infrastructure such as green roofs, planters or rain gardens. It should be confirmed whether water butts will be incorporated. Therefore, the proposal fails to demonstrate that it would prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, thereby conflicting with Policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted (2012).
